Source.Name: libsigrokdecode
Source.Summary: Provides the basic API for sigrok protocol decoders
Source.Description: libsigrokdecode is a shared library written in C which provides the basic API for running sigrok protocol decoders. The protocol decoders themselves are written in Python.
